Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にどうしようもないヤツらだねぇ、 アイツら。
Entry.EnglishText: Those guys are a hopeless bunch...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、橋の修理をしてくあたり、 なんとなく憎めないよネ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Although, it's hard for me to hate them since they're repairing the bridge and all.
Entry.Notes: next line: Damnit... It's all their fault...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、その怒りは、 サレたちにぶつけようよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, direct your anger towards Saleh and his comrades!

Entry.JapaneseText: そのためにも、今はあいつらのコトなんて 忘れて、先を急ごうヨ！ ねっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Forget about those <Blue>Dark Wings<White> guys and get a move on, Okay?
